title: Cannot Connect Please Check Firewall
body:
Hi,

I'm having issues at the moment joining games once champion select is over. About 25% of the time it will work as normal, the other 75% it will say there is an error joining the game and to check my firewall and reconnect. I have tried disabling my firewall and it does nothing. The only fix I've found is to close and open my client and reconnect to the game. This has about a 75% chance of working - sometimes it takes me 3-4 times of opening and closing the client. This is incredibly annoying as I'm often way behind by the time I get into the game.

Any suggestions on how to fix this? As I mentioned, this does not seem firewall related despite the error message. It has also been like this last patch too.

Thanks

replies.body: That could be a result of not [renewing your IP](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq9) for a long time. Try that.
